scripts.dev: npm run installDeps && npx concurrently -n stack,fe_build 'npm run dockerComposeUpDev' 'npm run feBuildAndWatch'
scripts.tests: npm run installDeps && npm run beMigrations && npx  concurrently 'npm run feUnitTests' 'npm run beUnitTests && npm run beFunctionalTests'
scripts.installDeps: npx concurrently --success="all" 'cd backend && composer install -q --prefer-dist' 'cd frontend && npm i -q --no-audit'
scripts.feUnitTests: echo 'TO BE IMPLEMENTED' && exit 0; cd frontend && npm run test:cli
scripts.beSeedDB: TAG=latest docker-compose run --rm backend php yii fixture/load "*",
